Stream notifications

The stream output is used to send updates to the user during long-running processes. Unlike conventional reactive outputs, the stream output does not have a render function. Instead messages are sent with sendStream. This allows message to “render” during long-running observers or other processes.

Arguments

id

A character string specifying the id of the stream output.

content

A character string specifying the message text.

session

A session object passed to the shiny server function, defaults to getDefaultReactiveDomain().

...

Additional named arguments passed as HTML attributes to the parent element.
